value.title: Introduction to data modeling in Power BI
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the basics of data modeling in Power BI, to get you started fast and easy!  Links to mentioned resources: Flat tables vs models power bi: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QWHE8N3AkT0  Get covid data in power bi: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4vfAz7XDuH0 or https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r9i7CTdOsBo

value.title: Is MANY TO MANY, too many? | Power BI many to many relationships explained
value.excerpt: In this video we are going to go through Power BI Many to many relationships that were realeased in the POwer BI desktop July 2018 update.  This is what we will cover: 1. What are Many to many relationships 2. Why you should avoid them  3. How to avoid them  Questions, comments? Let me know in the comment

value.title: Managing changing column names in Power Query #10: (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video, I will show how to manage column headers that changes names so your power bi file does not break when you refresh it.  This tip is from Lars Schreiber and here is the link to his blog post and how to do this in power query: http://power-bi-usergroup.blogspot.se/2015/12/dealing-with-tables-with-changing.html

value.title: Refer to a value, column or row in Power Query
value.excerpt: Have you ever tried to use a specific column, row or value in power query, but didnt now how to do it? value.title: Refresh Power BI every second or minute!
value.excerpt: In today's video I am going to show you how to refresh Power BI every minute or any interval you yet :). value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)

Also, I will show you how List.Range work, really cool function :)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too. value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)
value.excerpt: Sometimes you want to reduce data in Power BI Desktop so it's easier to work with. Then work with all the data in the Power BI Service. Patrick shows you 3 ways that can help do this without using Incremental Refresh or needing Power BI Premium!  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.
